lakes.name: Vembanad
lakes.known_for: The longest lake in India, Vembanad is renowned for its backwaters and houseboat cruises, as well as its ecological diversity.

lakes.name: Sambhar Lake
lakes.known_for: The largest saltwater lake in India, known for its salt production and as a bird sanctuary for migratory species.

lakes.name: Chilika Lake
lakes.known_for: The largest brackish water lagoon in India, renowned for its bird sanctuary, particularly during migration seasons.

lakes.name: Wular Lake
lakes.known_for: One of the largest freshwater lakes in India, it plays a crucial role in flood control and fishery resources in the region.

lakes.name: Kolleru Lake
lakes.known_for: A large freshwater lake known for its role as a bird sanctuary and its diverse wildlife, particularly migratory birds.

lakes.name: Dal Lake
lakes.known_for: Famous for its houseboats and shikaras (wooden boats), it is a major tourist attraction and an important part of the Srinagar landscape.

lakes.name: Nainital Lake
lakes.known_for: A picturesque lake located in the Nainital hill station, known for its scenic beauty and as a popular tourist destination.

lakes.name: Pukhrayan Lake
lakes.known_for: A smaller lake known for its local significance and natural beauty.
